entry.dcterms:coverage: Budapest, the settlements of the Danube bend
entry.dcterms:subject: person
survey data
cross-section
A random sample of telephone subscribers. The entire sample included a 496-person subsample from Budapest and a 513-person subsample from the surroundings of Nagymaros.
Telephone interview based on questionnaire.
A
